channel.title: Modifier on Jente Hidskes' personal website
channel.description: Recent content in Modifier on Jente Hidskes' personal website

item.title: GSoC part 9: the button stack page
item.description: When I discussed this project with my mentor before GSoC, he told me that the button mappings were going to be the most complicated piece. This week I’ve been working on precisely that and, well, let’s just say he wasn’t wrong 😉 If you’ve been following along on GitHub, you’re probably thinking that it was a slow week. Indeed, there hasn’t been that much activity this week as in previous weeks.
